程序包 org.janusgraph.diskstorage.keycolumnvalue

接口 KeyColumnValueStoreManager

所有超级接口:
StoreManager
所有已知实现类:
ExpectedValueCheckingStoreManager, KCVSManagerProxy, MetricInstrumentedStoreManager, OrderedKeyValueStoreManagerAdapter, TTLKCVSManager
public interface KeyColumnValueStoreManager
extends StoreManager
KeyColumnValueStoreManager provides the persistence context to the graph database storage backend.

A KeyColumnValueStoreManager provides transaction handles across multiple data stores that are managed by this KeyColumnValueStoreManager.

作者:
Matthias Bröcheler (me@matthiasb.com);

    修饰符和类型 方法 说明

    Executes multiple mutations at once.

    从接口继承的方法 org.janusgraph.diskstorage.keycolumnvalue.StoreManager

    beginTransaction, clearStorage, close, exists, getFeatures, getHadoopManager, getLocalKeyPartition, getName

  • 方法详细资料

    • openDatabase

      default KeyColumnValueStore openDatabase​(String name) throws BackendException
      Opens an ordered database by the given name. If the database does not exist, it is created. If it has already been opened, the existing handle is returned.
      参数:
      name - Name of database
      返回:
      Database Handle
      抛出:
      BackendException

    • openDatabase

      KeyColumnValueStore openDatabase​(String name, StoreMetaData.Container metaData) throws BackendException
      Opens an ordered database by the given name. If the database does not exist, it is created. If it has already been opened, the existing handle is returned.
      参数:
      name - Name of database
      metaData - options specific to this store
      返回:
      Database Handle
      抛出:
      BackendException

    • mutateMany

      void mutateMany​(Map<String,​Map<StaticBuffer,​KCVMutation>> mutations, StoreTransaction txh) throws BackendException
      Executes multiple mutations at once. For each store (identified by a string name) there is a map of (key,mutation) pairs that specifies all the mutations to execute against the particular store for that key. This is an optional operation. Check StoreManager.getFeatures() if it is supported by a particular implementation.
      参数:
      mutations -
      txh -
      抛出:
      BackendException
